attributes.action: Campaign to improve Ferry Fares & Services to the Isle of Wight
attributes.additional_details:
We would like the UK Government to look into & debate a way in which people travelling to and from the Isle of Wight can receive a better and more affordable Ferry Service.

This can be through a better regulated current Ferry Service Provider or a community run/nationalised ferry service provider.

This will make travel more affordable to islanders, the island more accessible for tourism and business yet preserve the islands natural beauty and heritage.
